articles.title: HNIs, algo prop traders can have a huge impact from STT hike: Mehul Kothari - Economic Times
articles.description: At this point in time, Nifty is still holding on to the support of the lower end of a falling channel. This channel holds importance because the index is trading inside this falling channel since it made an all-time high.
